alert.note: Alert for Panola; Shelby (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 7:37AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of De Soto Parish, southeastern Panola and northeastern Shelby Counties through 830 AM CDT... At 737 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northeast of Logansport, or 10 miles west of Mansfield, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mansfield, Stonewall, Logansport, Joaquin, South Mansfield, Keachi, Grand Cane, Longstreet, Stanley, Gloster, Keat Chie, Carmel, Frierson, Kingston, Kickapoo and Reeds Store. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
